name: Grolar Bear
movement: 40 ft. walking, 30 ft. swimming, 20 ft. climbing
description: The Grolar Bear is a large beast with exceptional physical strength and resilience, showcasing its power as a predator in diverse terrains.
memorable: Its ability to knock opponents prone with a powerful combination of bite and claw attacks makes it a dangerous foe.
goals: Typically hunts and ambushes prey, driven by instinct rather than strategy.
relations: Related to other large bears, it may be encountered alongside similar apex predators.
environment: Commonly found in wilderness areas where it has access to land, water, and trees for climbing.
strengths: Possesses high strength and solid hit points, making it both a dangerous attacker and a resilient combatant.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits strategic capabilities, making it rely on brute force.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with powerful bite and claws, dealing significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Smell allows it to track creatures more effectively through smell.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 13, reflecting decent awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Has a bonus to Perception, indicating average awareness.
additional_information: Excellent mobility with proficient swimming and climbing speeds.
Driven by instinct, reflecting its low intelligence.
Uses brute strength to dominate opponents in combat.
Can knock foes prone to enhance attack opportunities.

formidable bear that can swim and climb
powerful beast with knock prone attack
bear with keen sense of smell and high strength
